parameters: Hey, do you know about the Butt-Digging Slime?
Memerisu1
What's up all of a sudden...

I'm an investigator dispatched from the guild to this
island... Well, to put it simply, I'm the acting guild
master for this island.

It's possible you've already been dug into, but in the
forest to the northeast, there's been a Butt-Digging Slime
living there since ancient times.
Memerisu2

That's a monster with a name like it's the end of the
world...

Yes, I can't deny that... But they are gentle creatures by
nature, kind-hearted monsters that wouldn't hurt anyone.

At most, they just thoroughly dig into and develop the butts
of adventurers who invade their territory, regardless of
gender.

Furthermore, when they dig into butts, recent research shows
they also treat various anal conditions. The only downside
is becoming too accustomed to being dug into and ending up
with a split anal that specializes in butt orgasms.
Memerisu1
I see~...
Memerisu2
Wait! What does that have to do with me?!

Recently, there have been reports of individuals attacking
people and causing harm.
Memerisu2
Isn't being dug into the butt harmful...?

I want you to go to the forest of the Butt-Digging Slimes
and investigate the special ones that are causing harm to
people.
Of course, you'll be rewarded.
Memerisu2
Rewarded... But what if my butt gets dug into?!

Please don't say such things about having a small anal
opening when you're an adventurer.
Will you take on this request? Or not?
Accept
Decline
受ける
Memerisu2
Well... if there's a reward...

Good, then please head to the forest of digging right away
and start your investigation.
And one more thing to be cautious about...

In the forest, you'll encounter Butt-Digging Slimes quite
often. Be careful not to have your MP sucked out during an
anal orgasm.
Memerisu2
...I'm starting to want to refuse.
受けない
Memerisu2
I don't want to be dug into the butt, no thank you!
So... If you change your mind, come talk to me again.

In the forest, you'll often encounter Butt-Digging Slimes.
Be careful not to have your MP drained by an anal climax.
Memerisu1
I've caught a Butt-Digging Slime~.
What, you caught one!?
Memerisu1
Actually, it's a long story...
I see... So that's what happened. Understood.

For now, I'll take custody of the specimen. Here's your
reward, please take it.

We'll be able to take on requests regarding monsters from
now on, so feel free to come back anytime.
Gained 30 pieces of Slime!
Memerisu2
...Maybe I'll sell it.

Hello, Miss Memerisu, Miss Tina. Are you here to accept a
quest for monster subjugation?

Please choose the quest you'd like to accept from the
documents on the desk.

This is the guild dispatch office, as well as a makeshift
guild branch!
Memerisu1
Why is there a guild branch in the slums?
Because the rent is cheap!!

Request Name: "Return of the Slimy Slime" Target: "Slimy
Slime" Location: "Abandoned Mine" Reward: 20,000 Jewels

A monster has recently appeared in the abandoned mine. It's
a species not seen around here, and we ask for its
extermination before it settles in and increases in number.
Will you accept this request?
Yes
No
はい
Accepted the request "Return of the Slimy Slime"!

\c[17]You can check the details of the request under "Menu → Items
→ Key Items".
いいえ

Quest Name: "The Return of the Slimy Slime" Target: "Slimy
Slime" Location: "Abandoned Mine" Reward: 20,000 Jewels
This quest is currently accepted.

Quest Name "The Return of the Slimy Slimy Slimy" Target
"Slimy Slimy Slimy" Reward 20,000 Jewels
Already subdued.

Request: "Investigate the Suspicious Laboratory" Target:
"??????" Location: "Kochinukacity" Reward: 20,000 Jewels

A laboratory in Kochinukacity. There have been reports of
suspicious research being conducted, so an investigation has
been requested.
Will you accept this request?
Yes
No
はい

Laboratory"!

\c[17]You can check the details of the request under "Menu → Items
→ Key Items".
いいえ

Request: "Rescue the Villagers Abducted by Goblins" Target:
"Goblins" Location: "Mining Site" Reward: 20,000 Jewels

Goblins have made a nest at the mining site and abducted the
villagers. Please hurry and exterminate the goblins to
rescue the villagers. Kill all the goblins.
Will you accept this request?
Yes
No
はい

You have accepted the request "Rescue the Villagers Abducted
by Goblins"!

\c[17]You can check the details of the request under "Menu → Items
→ Key Items".
いいえ

Quest Name: "Rescue the Villagers Kidnapped by Goblins"
Target: "Goblins" Location: "Mining Site" Reward: 20000
Jewels
This quest is currently accepted.

Quest Name: "Rescue the Villagers Kidnapped by Goblins"
Target: "Goblins" Reward: 20000 Jewels
Already subdued.
It's best to get a return item before accepting a quest!

It seems you can get one in the village of Chern, so it's a
good idea to pick it up before you take on the quest!

The village of Chern is located to the northwest of
Kochinuka Island!

Quest Name: "Beware the Succubus" Target: "Succubus"
Location: "Southwest Ruins" Reward: 20,000 Jewels

A succubus has taken up residence in the southwest ruins and
is draining the life force of both men and women night after
night. Please punish her before the damage becomes more
severe.
Would you like to accept this quest?
Yes
No
はい
You have accepted the quest "Beware the Succubus"!

\c[17]You can check the details of the quest under "Menu → Items →
Key Items".
いいえ

Location: "Southwest Ruins" Reward: 20,000 Jewels
This request is currently accepted.
